The town's strategic location makes it the perfect base for exploring both coastal and inland attractions throughout the region.

faqs.question: Kan utlendinger kjøpe eiendom i Spania?
faqs.answer: Yes. Foreign nationals enjoy identical property purchase rights as Spanish citizens. Most international buyers require NIE (Spanish tax identification) numbers and legal representation, but the process remains straightforward. Our team assists with all documentation, ensuring compliance with Spanish property law and tax requirements.

faqs.question: Hva koster det å kjøpe eiendom i Spania?
faqs.answer: Beyond purchase price, expect approximately 7-10% in additional costs including notary fees (1%), property registration (0.5%), and legal representation (1.5-2%). Transfer tax rates vary by region (typically 6-8% in Murcia). Our agents provide detailed cost breakdowns before commitment, ensuring complete financial transparency.

faqs.question: Kan jeg få boliglån i Spania som utlending?
faqs.answer: Yes. Spanish banks increasingly offer mortgages to foreign buyers, typically covering 70-80% of property value. Requirements include valid NIE, proof of income, and credit history verification. Many international buyers combine Spanish mortgages with UK pension drawdown or international financing, optimizing tax efficiency.
